name: Silence The Sun
description:
"They call themselves gods, immortals born from sun itself... Today they will perish!"

Silence The Sun

You were summoned with only one goal, to annihilate the corrupted fortress that rules the Earth. Overpower your enemies! Evolve your creation as you become the ultimate apocalypse bringer in this new SHMUP game!


FEATURES:
  • Intense Shoot 'Em Up gameplay
  • Three unique levels and bosses
  • A grim world where only misery befalls
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 2 GB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard / Mouse

(This game is a student project made in 8 weeks, created by 13 students at The Game Assembly. Credits is shown in the game. No further development will be made.)
